plan.title: Plan - GenAI Marketing Tools
plan.description: Research, analyze, and strategize with AI-powered market research, audience intelligence, and competitive analysis tools. These solutions help marketers make data-driven decisions and develop winning strategies.
plan.longDescription: The Plan category encompasses AI tools that help marketers understand their market landscape before taking action. Market Research tools leverage AI to uncover trends and insights. Audience Intelligence platforms analyze customer behavior and preferences. Competitive Analysis tools track and analyze competitor strategies. AI Assistants provide on-demand strategic guidance and insights.

create.title: Create - GenAI Marketing Tools
create.description: Generate compelling content with AI-powered creative tools for ads, copy, landing pages, and social media. These tools help marketers produce high-quality content faster and at scale.
create.longDescription: The Create category features AI tools that transform how marketing content is produced. Ad Creative tools generate high-performing ad variations. Copywriting & SEO platforms create optimized content for search and conversion. Landing Page builders use AI for rapid page creation. Social & Influencer tools help discover and create social content.

activate.title: Activate - GenAI Marketing Tools
activate.description: Launch and manage campaigns with AI-powered activation tools for campaign management, email, ad platforms, and personalized shopping experiences. These tools help marketers reach customers efficiently.
activate.longDescription: The Activate category includes AI tools that power marketing execution. Campaign Management platforms automate and optimize multi-channel campaigns. Email & Outreach tools personalize communication at scale. AI Ad Platforms leverage machine learning for smarter media buying. Shopping Assistants provide personalized product recommendations and conversational commerce.

measure.title: Measure - GenAI Marketing Tools
measure.description: Track, analyze, and optimize with AI-powered measurement tools for attribution, analytics, and AI visibility. These tools help marketers understand performance and make data-driven improvements.
measure.longDescription: The Measure category provides AI tools for understanding marketing performance. Attribution platforms accurately assign credit across customer touchpoints. Analytics tools surface actionable insights and predict trends. AI Visibility tools monitor how your brand appears in AI search results and recommendations.
